Reviews_Description: Excellent car, the drive height is of a mid-size SUV. Hardly any feeling of bumps, the engine sounds like a jetliner. The car is very spacious from the inside, with good legroom for both the front and rear.

Buying experience: The Car interior and finish are excellent and, on the whole, it feels luxury. The dashboard and centre console have a nice in color combination patterned finish to them. Great experience while driving and looks fabulous in orange and white colour. It gives good mileage and is good for Indian road conditions.
It's a beautiful car with the best performance-oriented and fun to drive with a turbo.

This car has a very unique design and is one of the reasons I bought it. There was once an issue with the engine but it was resolved very fast by the company. I would give it 5 out of 5 stars and recommend it to everyone.

This car has very aggressive pricing. The price attracted me the most and after taking the test drive I decided to buy this car. Overall experience is very good and the dealership experience is good and after-sales are good too.
It has some missing features in this segment. This is one of the best cars I have ever seen. The comfort and power of this car give even we cannot expect that from Tata punch.
I took a test drive and it was nice. It's a good average, nice interior, and plenty of seating space in the car with comfort, and nice satisfaction.
This is an excellent car and looking a complete SUV car. The mileage is outstanding and I am satisfied with the car.
This is the best car with a sporty engine and affordable car. The mileage and comfort are also good.
Awesome car with good looks, mileage, and price. Its interior is also really nice.

This is a very spacious car with very good seats which are very comfortable as well. My family of 5 easily fits in the car, and there was no compilation from anyone even after a drive of 7 continuous hours.
I am driving this car for some time, and I have not faced any issues till now. I love the driving experience of the car and the on-road presence. The car has great looks which attract every eye.

This car is a complete package all In one. It has multiple features including a 10-inch touchscreen system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. All the features and everything makes it a premium car with good looks and great design.

It gets a 1200cc engine with 5-speed MTis paired to the naturally aspirated unit. The engine provides good power and is very quick. The only bad thing about this wonderful car is that there is no diesel engine and automatic transmission on offer.

Citroen C3 is a very good car in terms of design and fit and finish. According to me, the driving experience is just fabulous. It is not overpriced and the performance is also good. It looks good, has many customization options, and comes with two very potent engines that go about their jobs flawlessly.

I did not have a good experience with this car as there are no automatic options, even at the top variant. Unlike other cars in the segment, there are no CNG variants available. Lots of missing features. From basics like powered mirrors to essentials like rear wiper/defogger.
It is a good car with amazing looks. I am impressed with the smooth driving and amazing speed.
Citroen C3 is an average-looking car but in this price range, it gives lots of features which make it different from its competitors. I really like the design interior & exterior.
The car looks better, and the special thing about this car is perfectly best in comfort in this class.

Rating_Title: Very Good Car In This Price Range
Reviews_Description: Very good car in this price range with good comfort, stylish look, and very good performance. Value for money.

Rating_Title: Citroen C3 Is A Feature Rich Car
Reviews_Description: In terms of design, the Citroen C3 looks quite different. It gets Citroen's signature grille with chrome treatment which gets split headlamps at the front. A lot of features are available in this new hatchback car. It also comes with a USB fast charger for front and rear seat passengers.

Citroen C3 is very affordable and gives lots of features in this price range. Only I am afraid to buy this car is the new brand in the market, though it already launched its car the confidence for the brand is not high otherwise it looks like a complete package lookswise, safety features, & other specs.

I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR LAST 5 YEARS TO BUY A BUDGET-FRIENDLY, GOOD SPECS, FEATURES UNDER 6 LACS AND BELIEVE ME THAT THIS MADE POSSIBLE, I AM VERY HAPPY THAT I HAVE BOOKED THIS CAR, I FEEL AND HEARD THAT IT IS A FRENCH CAR AND WILL BE VERY COMFORTABLE TO RIDE ON INDIAN ROADS, THANKS TO CITROEN TO MAKE THIS CAR TO MAKE MILLIONS DREAM COME TRUE, GREA...
The best car in this segment and it has great features. It has decent mileage and matianance cost is low. Overall, this is a good car.

Based on the overall requirements of this current generation this car has been designed. It has amazing features at an affordable price. Keeping the choice of youths to senior citizens car is designed. Overall we can say it's a complete package of luxury and entertainment.
It's a good car in this segment and its performance is just amazing. It gives good mileage and has great features. The Interior look is fantastic. Overall, this is a value for money.
Good performance with low price, and very useful to middle-class people. I suggest this car for better comfort.
Citroen has an awesome driving experience in this price range as compared to its competitors. It is best in its comfort anyone with a 7-8 lakh budget can buy one blindly.
Overall look wise very well, but about features and mileage, we can't say about it. But we hope it will come with good features and better mileage.
